HSK 4: 傲
HSK 6: 奧,奥
(Simplified: 骜)
(Simplified: 骜)
Freq: 9656
Hanzi: 骜
骜：形声词。从马,敖声。本义:好马,良马。同本义《noblesteed》良马期乎千里,不期乎骥骜。
——《吕氏春秋·察今》 注:“千里马也。王者乘之游敖,因曰骥骜也。” 又如:骜放 (任性傲物)
Ao : pictophonetic words. From Ma, Ao Sheng. Original meaning: good horse, good horse. With the original meaning "noblesteed" a good horse of almost a thousand miles, almost unexpected Ji Ao .
—— "Lu Shi Chunqiu · Chajin" Note: "Thousands of horses. The king takes the tour of Ao, because it is called Ji Ji." Another example: Gao Fang (willing and proud of things)

驁字的基本解释

驁
ào
见“骜”。

驁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ào］
［《廣韻》五到切，去号，疑。］
［《廣韻》五勞切，平豪，疑。］
亦作“汼2”。亦作“1”。“骜1”的繁体字。
(1)骏马名。
(2)比喻才能出众。
(3)马怒，不驯服。
(4)狂妄；傲慢。
(5)指轻视。
(6)古乐章名，专指《骜夏》。

驁字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驁； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1444第18
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?牛刀切，音敖。【廣韻】駿馬。　又馬驕不馴也。【莊子·外物篇】老萊子謂仲尼曰：夫不忍一世之傷而驁萬世之患，抑固窶邪。忘其略弗及邪。【註】不云驁然不顧貽萬世之患，但云驁萬世之患，古文省字法也。又【前漢·竇嬰傳】諸公稍自引而怠驁。　又驁夏，樂章名。【周禮·春官·鍾師】凡樂事，以鐘鼓奏九夏，王夏、肆夏、昭夏、納夏、章夏、齊夏、族夏、祴夏、驁夏。【集韻】或作驁。　又【集韻】【正韻】魚到切【韻會】疑到切，?音傲。義同。　又【集韻】牛召切，音鏊。驕驁，馬行貌。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ào］
["Guangyun" Five to cut, go to the number, doubt. ]
["Guangyun" Five hard work, Pinghao, doubt. ]
Also known as "Chan 2". Also known as "1". "骜1" in traditional characters.
(1) The name of the steed.
(2) Metaphors can be outstanding.
(3) The horse is angry and untamed.
(4) Arrogance; arrogance.
(5) Refers to contempt.
(6) The name of the ancient music chapter, referring specifically to "Liao Xia".

[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Cut with a great knife, sound Ao. [Guang Yun] Horses.　Ma arrogant and rebellious. [Zhuangzi·Foreign Objects] Lao Laizi said that Zhong Ni said: The husband cannot bear the wounds of one life and the sufferings of all ages, restraining the evil. Forget about the evil. [Note] It’s not that Yunao does not care about the troubles that will last forever, but the troubles that will last forever, the ancient writing also saves the writing method.
